title: How Earthbound Became The Ultimate Cult Classic | Retrospective Documentary

media:group.media:title: How Earthbound Became The Ultimate Cult Classic | Retrospective Documentary
media:group.media:description:
In today's video, we will explore the complete history of Earthbound, from the game's initial ideas and inception to its localization issues and legacy. This video, despite being over an hour long, doesn't cover EVERYTHING about the game, but offers a nice snapshot into my favorite game's interesting history. 

Earthbound/Mother 2 Interviews:
https://yomuka.wordpress.com/2009/04/30/famitsu-06191992/

Clyde Mandelin Legends of Localization Book:
https://www.fangamer.com/products/legends-of-localization-book-2-earthbound

PDF Scan of Mother 2/Earthbound’s Official Guides:
https://archive.org/details/mother-2-himitsu-no-takarabako-strategy-guide-scan-jp-sfc/page/42/mode/2up?q=Shigesato+Itoi

https://www.nintendo.co.jp/clvs/manuals/common/pdf/CLV-P-SAAJE.pdf

The Video Game History Foundation’s Secret Earthbound Content Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ML9hBkE_ZPA

Earthbound Anti-Piracy Showcase (Thane Gaming): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tu_C2mvkoWs
